title: I would like some help
body:
Hey everyone, this type of post has probably been on these forums every second of every day, however I'm gonna post it anyway. So in a nutshell, I'm looking for someone who has been around for a while, played lots of games and is at least decent at the game. I'd like to get better at league, but I'm not sure where to start, I've been playing on and off for about 2 years on a few different accounts, some of which I have no access to anymore. I'm not totally horrible, but I'm not great either. If anyone could come play a few matches with me every now and again, and teach me on how to improve my game play I would be grateful. I currently play mid and jungle almost equal amounts, and I also plan on maining Lee Sin. Hit me up if you are willing to help.

Thanks in advance,
MyDadsDumbFace.

replies.body: Why cant you access your other accounts?
